title: IllegalArgumentException: Committee information must be derived from a state no older than the previous epoch
body:
I've just upgraded to teku/v0.12.4-dev-4855f89c/linux-x86_64/-privatebuild-openjdk64bitservervm-java-13 and have started seeing this message very frequently (on average every 90 seconds).

This is the same message as reported in #2570. However I am opening a new issue as I _am_ producing attestations and getting them into blocks. I don't think this message relates relates to that issue.

```
12:40:12.244 INFO  - ^[[37mSlot Event  *** Slot: 64700, Block: 637850..fb65, Epoch: 2021, Finalized checkpoint: 2019, Finalized root: 90a6f8..b678, Peers: 37^[[0m
12:40:16.226 INFO  - ^[[34mValidator   *** Published aggregate    Count: 1, Slot: 64700, Root: 29695d..db7f^[[0m
12:40:24.244 INFO  - ^[[37mSlot Event  *** Slot: 64701, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 2021, Finalized checkpoint: 2019, Finalized root: 90a6f8..b678, Peers: 39^[[0m
12:40:32.316 INFO  - ^[[34mValidator   *** Published attestation  Count: 2, Slot: 64702, Root: 637850..fb65^[[0m
12:40:35.421 WARN  - Encountered exception while processing message for topic /eth2/e7a75d5a/beacon_attestation_17/ssz_snappy
java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Committee information must be derived from a state no older than the previous epoch. State at slot 64639 is older than cutoff slot 64640
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:314) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniApplyNow(CompletableFuture.java:683) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniApplyStage(CompletableFuture.java:658) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.thenApply(CompletableFuture.java:2165) [?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.thenApply(SafeFuture.java:320) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.gossip.topics.validation.AttestationValidator.singleOrAggregateAttestationChecks(AttestationValidator.java:125) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.gossip.topics.validation.AttestationValidator.validate(AttestationValidator.java:69) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.gossip.topics.SingleAttestationTopicHandler.validateData(SingleAttestationTopicHandler.java:100) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.gossip.topics.SingleAttestationTopicHandler.validateData(SingleAttestationTopicHandler.java:27) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.gossip.topics.Eth2TopicHandler.lambda$handleMessage$2(Eth2TopicHandler.java:39) ~[teku-networking-eth2-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniComposeStage(CompletableFuture.java:1183) [?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.thenCompose(CompletableFuture.java:2306) [?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.thenCompose(SafeFuture.java:364) [teku-infrastructure-async-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]

        at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.libp2p.gossip.GossipHandler.apply(GossipHandler.java:34) [teku-networking-p2p-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
        at io.libp2p.pubsub.PubsubApiImpl.onNewMessage(PubsubApiImpl.kt:79) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.5-RELEASE.jar:?]

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:830) [?:?]
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Committee information must be derived from a state no older than the previous epoch. State at slot 64639 is older than cutoff slot 64640
        at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument(Preconditions.java:441) ~[guava-29.0-jre.jar:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.CommitteeUtil.validateStateForCommitteeQuery(CommitteeUtil.java:252) ~[teku-ethereum-datastructures-0.12.4-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.4-dev-4855f89c]
